daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: Recent updates from New York City include a tragic pedestrian fatality in the Bronx, a five-alarm apartment fire, a baby formula recall linked to botulism, and ongoing discussions about housing affordability as median home prices reach record highs amidst a housing crisis.
